uk.ac.ebi.mdk.service.location
Interface LocationDescription

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultLocationDescription
public interface LocationDescription

LocationDescription - 23.02.2012

Class describes a required ResourceLocation for a ResourceLoader. It provides methods for name and description access as well as type storage and a default location

Version:
$Rev$
Author:
johnmay, $Author$ (this version)
